# [1.1 The Nature of Astronomy](https://openstax.org/books/astronomy-2e/pages/1-1-the-nature-of-astronomy)


:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}
- Astronomy $\Rightarrow$ looking for patterns among stars
- Modern astronomy is more than cataloging objects.
- How do stars (matter and energy) work and interact?
- What is the universe?
- How do humans fit in?
:::
::: {.column width="45%"}

## Modern Astronomy {background-image="figures/01/hst30th-5stars-1918a.jpg" background-size="cover" background-opacity=".35"}

Studying the Universe reveals many things

- Stars generate energy by fusing light elements $\rightarrow$ heavy elements
- Stars die and throw material out into the cosmos
- New stars and planets form
- Almost every atom in our bodies was forged in a star ^[[Image: Star Eta Carinae violently outbursting material](https://hubblesite.org/mission-and-telescope/hubble-30th-anniversary/hubbles-exciting-universe/beholding-the-birth-and-death-of-stars) ]

# [1.2 The Nature of Science](https://openstax.org/books/astronomy-2e/pages/1-2-the-nature-of-science)

## Scientific ideas change over time 

<iframe width=1000px height=800px src="https://astro.unl.edu/classaction/animations/renaissance/pathtracer.html"></iframe>

## Hypothesis

An idea that has **testable** and **falsifiable** predictions.

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}

Is a hypothesis

::: {.callout-note}
## Speed of light is constant
- Can be falsified. Find one thing moving faster.
- Leads to *Theory of Special Relativity*.
:::
:::
::: {.column width="50%"}

Is not a hypothesis

::: {.callout-important}
## A teacup orbits Mars
- Cannot be falsified? You just haven't looked hard enough.
- Has no predicting utility.
:::
:::

::::


## Scientific Ideas Change {.center .smaller}

Have you ever heard of the Luminiferous ether?

![[Concept of the aether wind across the solar system.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michelson%E2%80%93Morley_experiment#/media/File:AetherWind.svg) ](figures/01/AetherWind.svg){#fig-aether-wind fig-align="left"} 

::: {.fragment}
- Hypothesized material to explain how light travels through vacuum of space.
-  It was wrong!

Old ideas are rejected in science! 
:::

## Scientific Progress


:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="65%"}
Science's vulnerability is its greatest strength!

Einstein's Cosmological constant

- Proposed to "fix" the dynamic universe predicted by Einstein's equations.
- Ultimately rejected as more evidence discovered.
- "my greatest mistake" - Einstein
:::
::: {.column width="30%"}

![[Biking in circles trying to fix his equations.](https://digital.archives.caltech.edu/islandora/object/image%3A1780) ](figures/01/Einstein-Bike.jpg){#fig-ein-bike fig-align="left"} 
:::

::::
